siteInfo.tagLine: Front-end web developer based in Lisbon, Portugal
siteInfo.description: Arden de Raaij, front-end web developer based in Lisbon, Portugal

introSmall: I create awesome websites/web-apps which are enjoyable and fun to use.
You can find some of my code on Github
, see my experiments on Codepen
, and view my CV/experience on LinkedIn.
I love photography and traveling, the combination of which you can find on my Instagram.
You can follow me on Twitter

for random shower thoughts.

Feel free to contact me
